documentation.text: @title ZorroController: The main controller of the Zorro yield farming protocol. Used for cash flow operations (deposit/withdrawal), managing vaults, and rewards allocations, among other things.
@title ZorroController: The main controller of the Zorro yield farming protocol. Used for cash flow operations (deposit/withdrawal), managing vaults, and rewards allocations, among other things.

add(uint256,address,bool,address,address.details: DO NOT add the same Want token more than once. Rewards will be messed up if you do. (Only if Want tokens are stored here.)

params._allocPoint: The number of allocation points for this pool (aka "multiplier")
params._intermediaryToken: The address of an intermediary token (i.e. what is returned back to the user upon withdrawal) or 0 (only applicable for protocols like Tranchess)
params._vault: The contract address of the underlying vault
params._want: The address of the want token
params._withUpdate: Mass update all pools if set to true

params._buybackAmount: The amount of earned token to buyback
params._earnedAddress: The address of the ERC20 earned token to buy back
params._earnedToZORLPPoolToken0Path: The router path for swapping from the Earn token to the primary Zorro LP Pool's 0th token
params._earnedToZORLPPoolToken1Path: The router path for swapping from the Earn token to the primary Zorro LP Pool's 1st token
params._earnedToZORPath: The router path for swapping from the Earn token to the ZOR token on BSC (home chain)
params._revShareAmount: The amount of earned token to share as revenue to the ZOR staking vault

params._BSCMarketTVLUSD: total market TVL on the BSC chain in USD
params._ZorroTotalVaultTVLUSD: total TVL locked into the Zorro protocol across all vaults
params._publicPool: address of the public pool to draw rewards from
params._startBlock: start block number. If current block is below this number, rewards won't be emitted. https://bscscan.com/block/countdown/13650292
params._targetTVLCaptureBasisPoints: how many basis points of the BSC total market TVL the protocol desires to capture (influences market aware emissions calcs)
params._timelockOwner: address of owner (should be a timelock)

params._wantAmt: how much Want token to deposit
params._weeksCommitted: how many weeks the user is committing to on this vault

params._maxMarketMovement: factor to account for max market movement/slippage. The definition varies by Vault, so consult the associated Vault contract for info
params._pid: index of pool to deposit into
params._valueUSDC: value in USDC (in ether units) to deposit
params._weeksCommitted: how many weeks to commit to the Pool (can be 0 or any uint)

returns._0: Number of Zorro tokens per block

inCaseTokensGetStuck(address,uint256).details: Does not permit usage for the Zorro token

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._amountUSDCBuyback: The amount in USDC that was bought back
params._amountUSDCRevShare: The amount in USDC that was rev-shared
params._failedAmountUSDCBuyback: The previously failed buyback amount that was successfully retried
params._failedAmountUSDCRevShare: The previously failed revshare amount that was successfully retried

params._amount: The quantity of ZOR tokens to burn

params._amountUSDCBuyback: The amount in USDC that should be minted for LP + burn
params._amountUSDCRevShare: The amount in USDC that should be minted for revenue sharing with ZOR stakers
params._callbackContract: Address of destination contract in bytes for the callback
params._chainId: The ID of the chain that this request originated from
params._failedAmountUSDCBuyback: The previously failed buyback amount that is being retried
params._failedAmountUSDCRevShare: The previously failed revshare amount that is being retried

params._account: The user on this chain who initiated the withdrawal request
params._callbackContract: The remote contract that called this function.
params._chainId: The Chain ID of the remote chain that initiated this request
params._maxMarketMovement: factor to account for max market movement/slippage. // TODO - need definition
params._originalDepositUSDC: The amount originally deposited into this tranche // TODO net- or gross- of fees? IMPORTANT
params._pid: The pool ID on the remote chain that the user withdrew from
params._trancheId: The ID of the tranche on the remote chain, that was originally used to deposit
params._withdrawnUSDC: The amount of USDC withdrawn on the remote chain

params._account: The address of the wallet (cross chain identity) to unlock funds for
params._amountUSDC: The amount in USDC that should be unlocked and burned

params._amountBuybackUSDC: The amount of buyback in USDC attempted for cross chain operations
params._amountRevShareUSDC: The amount of revshare in USDC attempted for cross chain operations
params._blockNumber: The block number on the remote chain that the earnings distribution was for
params._pid: The pool ID on the remote chain that the earnings distribution was from

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

revertXChainDeposit(address,uint256).details: Unlocks USDC and returns it to depositor

params._amountUSDC: The amount originally deposited (TODO: inclusive of fees?)

params._chainId: The Zorro destination chain ID so that the request can be routed to the appropriate chain
params._destinationContract: The address of the smart contract on the destination chain
params._payload: The input payload for the destination function, encoded in bytes (EVM ABI or equivalent depending on chain)

params._chainId: The Zorro destination chain ID so that the request can be routed to the appropriate chain
params._destinationContract: The address of the smart contract on the destination chain
params._payload: The input payload for the destination function, encoded in bytes (EVM ABI or equivalent depending on chain)

params._allocPoint: The number of allocation points for this pool (aka "multiplier")
params._intermediaryToken: The address of an intermediary token (i.e. what is returned back to the user upon withdrawal) or 0 (only applicable for protocols like Tranchess)
params._pid: The index of the pool ID
params._withUpdate: Mass update all pools if set to true

params._maxMarketMovement: factor to account for max market movement/slippage. The definition varies by Vault, so consult the associated Vault contract for info

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._harvestOnly: If true, will only harvest Zorro tokens but not do a withdrawal
If true, will only harvest Zorro tokens but not do a withdrawal
params._maxMarketMovement: factor to account for max market movement/slippage. The definition varies by Vault, so consult the associated Vault contract for info
params._pid: index of pool to deposit into

devdoc.title: ZorroController: The main controller of the Zorro yield farming protocol. Used for cash flow operations (deposit/withdrawal), managing vaults, and rewards allocations, among other things.

add(uint256,address,bool,address,address.notice: Adds a new pool. Can only be called by the owner.

buyBackAndRevShare(uint256,address,uint2.notice: Performs both buyback and rev share operations for either on-chain or cross-chain

deposit(uint256,uint256,uint256).notice: Deposit Want tokens to associated Vault

depositFullService(uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Deposits funds in a full service manner (performs autoswaps and obtains Want tokens)

getZorroPerBlock().notice: Determine the number of Zorro to emit per block based on current market parameters

inCaseTokensGetStuck(address,uint256).notice: For owner to recover ERC20 tokens on this contract if stuck

massUpdatePools().notice: Updates reward variables of all pools

pendingZORRORewards(uint256,address).notice: View function to see pending ZORRO on frontend.

poolLength().notice: Number of pools in the Zorro protocol

receiveBurnLockedEarningsRequest(uint256.notice: Receives cross chain request for burning any temporarily locked funds for earnings

receiveXChainBurnRewardsRequest(uint256).notice: Receives an authorized burn request from another chain and burns the specified amount of ZOR tokens from the public pool

receiveXChainDistributionRequest(uint256.notice: Receives an authorized request from remote chains to perform earnings fee distribution events, such as: buyback + LP + burn, and revenue share

receiveXChainRepatriationRequest(address.notice: Receives a repatriation request from another chain and takes care of all financial operations (unlock/mint/burn) to pay the user their withdrawn funds from another chain

receiveXChainUnlockRequest(address,uint2.notice: Receives a request from home chain (BSC) to unlock and burn temporarily withheld USDC.

recoverXChainFeeDist(uint256,uint256,uin.notice: Recovery function for when home chain `receiveXChainDistributionRequest()` function fails

revertXChainDeposit(address,uint256).notice: Called by oracle when the deposit logic on the remote chain failed, and the deposit logic on this chain thus needs to be reverted

sendXChainDepositRequest(uint256,bytes,b.notice: Prepares and sends a cross chain deposit request. Takes care of necessary financial ops (transfer/locking USDC)

sendXChainWithdrawalRequest(uint256,byte.notice: Prepares and sends a cross chain withdrwal request.

set(uint256,uint256,bool,address).notice: Update the given pool's ZORRO allocation point. Can only be called by the owner.

stakedWantTokens(uint256,address).notice: View function to see staked Want tokens on frontend.

trancheLength(uint256,address).notice: Number of tranches invested by a given user into a given pool

transferInvestment(uint256,uint256,uint2.notice: Transfer all assets from a tranche in one vault to a new vault

updatePool(uint256).notice: Update reward variables of the given pool to be up-to-date.

withdraw(uint256,uint256,bool).notice: Fully withdraw Want tokens from underlying Vault.

withdrawAll(uint256).notice: Withdraw the maximum number of Want tokens from a pool

withdrawalFullService(uint256,uint256,bo.notice: Withdraws funds from a pool and converts the Want token into USDC
